Watch, listen and play together with friends

Watching your favorite TV show with your friends or family is among one of life’s greatest home comforts, but we can’t always be together with those who are dearest to us. That’s why the new SharePlay feature on iOS 15.
subtitle: Play together

html:
Watch, listen and play together with friends

Now, through FaceTime, you can watch TV shows, listen to music or play games with friends on your iPhone in real-time. It works really well, making you feel as though you’re back at home, college or wherever it is that you like to hang out.
subtitle: Play together

html:
Watch, listen and play together with friends

All you need to do is tap the SharePlay icon when you’re in a FaceTime call with your loved ones, and there you’ll see the apps that work with it.
subtitle: Play together

html:
Watch, listen and play together with friends

For instance, you can pick Apple Music, select newest Beyonce or Radiohead album and it will play on both your phones while you’re in the call. If you need to pause it to get to the toilet, it will pause on both of your devices.
subtitle: Play together

html:
Watch, listen and play together with friends

Apple apps already work with it and a bunch of 3rd party apps work with it too – AppleTV, Disney+ and TikTok.
